description: Those arriving from the UK with symptoms will need to self-isolate immediately under new measures.
title: Coronavirus: Guernsey to self-isolate symptomatic UK returnees
title_page: Coronavirus: Guernsey to self-isolate symptomatic UK returnees - BBC News
maintext: Deputy Heidi Soulsby, president of the health and social care committee, said: "The focus of our Public Health advice that we are issuing to our community, in response to COVID-19, is all about preparedness and doing everything we can to slow down the potential spread of the virus across the islands."
